name: Slime Loop
description:
My entry for the TriJam #189

Suck slimes into your energy pool to charge a spell and release it against the center portal. The slimes colour will determine the element of your spell: Fire, water or nature. Collect coins by using the opposite element to what colour the portal is:

  • Fire is effective against a green portal
  • Water is effective against a red portal
  • Nature is effective against a blue portal

Avoid the slimes overtaking the arena, if the bar on the right side of the screen reaches 100% you lose.

  • A/D: Move left or right
  • SPACE: Charge spell with nearby slimes
  • LMB: Cast spell when fully charged

Unfortunately, I got carried away and it took more than 3 hours to complete this project. In total, I've spend a bit more than 5 hours trying to make the gameplay work.
